name: CosmosCreed
description:
Is "Cosmos Creed" just another shoot'em up (shmup)? absolutely NOT!While maintaining old-school essence "CosmosCreed" brings staggering visuals, a more realistic gameplay approach along with a stimulating original soundtrack that will keep you immersed throughout your journey of keeping the skies clear from enemy encroachments."

Features:

1- 3D top-down shooter

2- Variety of enemies and their arsenal

3- 11 unique levels of breath-taking environments

4- Each level incorporates 4 difficulty modes

5- Intuitive weapon's panel

6- Customized control modes

7- Comprehensive upgrade system and Powerups

8- well-designed sysematic and balanced upgrade system

9- Quality profiles to support almost every device in the market

10- An intimidating BOSS for each level

11- Vie for the top with your high score by bringing off objectives in every level

12- In-app purchases for the impatients to speed up their upgrades

13- High-score leaderboard and achievements

14- Supported Languages:

*-English
*-Arabic
*-French
*-Italian
*-German
*-Spanish
*-Japanese
*-Korean
*-Brazilian Portuguese
*-Portugal Portuguese
*-Russian
*-Simplified Chinese
*-Traditional Chinese *-Thai
*-Greek
*-Turkish
*-Dutch"
